TopicTitle: Typing while editing the content of the planted flag doesn't lock other controls outside of the textbox and numbers cannot be inputted

Articles.Content:
Things likes pressing 'M' opens the man, pressing ',' (comma) and '.' (period) changes warp time.

Also, numbers can not be inputted even when pressing on the numpad.

Edited March 21, 2023 by VecTorr
Added Tags
This has been fixed as of v0.1.3.
